column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I'm not so into cafes
column2: but this one is nice and always busy
column3: so i dropped in one late weekend afternoon.  I ordered their cheesecake and it was not all that
column4: and certainly did not justify it's $6.50 price tag.  It was pretty
column7: and orange chocolate milk chocolate pieces
column8: but it's what's on the inside that matters most
column11: dark cherries that I was not so fond of.
